tasks.title: Plan workshop curriculum for custodial pathways training program
tasks.description: Develop comprehensive curriculum covering key topics for custodial pathways training including mentoring, economy model, and skill development

tasks.title: Create workshop materials and resources
tasks.description: Develop presentation materials, handouts, and interactive resources for workshop sessions

tasks.title: Schedule workshop sessions and venues
tasks.description: Plan and book workshop sessions, coordinate venues, and manage participant registration

tasks.title: Develop participant feedback and evaluation system
tasks.description: Create systems for collecting workshop feedback and tracking participant progress
